fields.name: Massing on the Milkwater
fields.lowest_bidder: If he has more than one House card in this hand, he discards all cards with the highest combat strength.
fields.everyone_else: If they have more than one House card in their hand, they must choose and discard one of those cards.
fields.highest_bidder: Returns his entire House card discard pile into his hand.

fields.name: A King Beyound the Wall
fields.lowest_bidder: Moves his tokens to the lowest position of every Influence track.
fields.everyone_else: In turn order, each player chooses either the Fiefdom or King's Court Influence track and moves his token to the lowest position of that track.
fields.highest_bidder: Moves this token to the top of one Influence track of his choice, then takes the appropriate Dominance token.

fields.name: Preemptive Raid
fields.lowest_bidder: Chooses one the following: A: Destroy 2 of his units anywhere, B: Is reduced 2 positions on his highest Influence Track.
fields.highest_bidder: The wildlings immediately attack again with a strength of 6. You do not participate in the bidding against this attack (nor do you receive anay reward or penalties).

fields.name: Mammoth Riders
fields.highest_bidder: may retrieve 1 House card of his choice from his House card discard pile.

fields.name: Rattleshirt's Raiders
fields.lowest_bidder: Is reduced 2 positions on the supply track (to no lower than 0).
fields.everyone_else: Is reduced 1 position on the supply track (to no lower than 0).
fields.highest_bidder: In increased 1 position on the supply track (to no higher than 6).

fields.name: Crow Killers
fields.lowest_bidder: Replaces all of his Knights with available Footmen. Any Knight unable to be replaced is destroyed.
fields.everyone_else: Replaces 2 of their Knights with available Footmen. Any Knight unable to be replaced is destroyed.
fields.highest_bidder: May immediatly replace up to 2 of his Footmen, anywhere, with available Knights.

fields.name: Skinchanger Scout
fields.everyone_else: Discards 2 available Power token, or as many as they are able.
fields.highest_bidder: All Power tokens he bid on this attack are immediatly returned to his available Power.

fields.name: The Horde Descends
fields.lowest_bidder: Destroys 2 of his units at one of his Castles or Strongholds. If unable, he destroys 2 of his units anywhere.
fields.highest_bidder: May muster forces (following normal mustering rules) in any one Castle or Stronghold are he controls.
